candidates.reason: Swarm Consensus (7 votes): groq: As a Bitcoin mining stock, RIOT exhibits similar characteristics to MARA, following crypto cycles and experiencing high volatility. Recent Bitcoin price weakness makes it a potential mean reversion play if Bitcoin recovers.
